abstract: Lawyers for State of Pennsylvania and for Harrisburg, Pa, Mayor Linda Thompson ask federal Judge Mary D France to throw out bankruptcy petition filed for the city one week after the Harrisburg City Council voted for it.
snippet: Lawyers for Pennsylvania and for Harrisburg’s mayor have asked a federal judge to throw out the bankruptcy petition filed for the city this week after the City Council voted for it.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Pennsylvania and for Harrisburg’s mayor have asked a federal judge to throw out the bankruptcy petition filed for the city this week after the City Council voted for it.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Mayor and State Oppose Bankruptcy Petition for Harrisburg
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Mayor and State Oppose Bankruptcy Petition for Harrisburg
headline.seo: Harrisburg Mayor and State Oppose City Bankruptcy
